verb.definition: Discover the exact place or position of.
verb.example: Engineers were working to locate the fault.
The company located its headquarters in New York.

noun.example: The property is set in a stunning location.

noun.definition: The action of locating someone or something.
noun.example: The location of the missing plane was difficult.

usage_examples: We were unable to locate the source of the noise.
Our office is located in the city center.
